foot_intro: TheHotGames.Com is your #1 source for hot flash games. We only add the most popular games from around the internet so you never have a chance to get bored. Our game categories include shooting games, racing games, strategy games, puzzle games and others. You don't need to pay or even download anything. Just click and play you favorite flash games for free. Enjoy!
